genre_description: An alternate history/period piece drama featuring a highly advanced AI assistant providing logistical, safety, and professional support to a family traveling across mid-20th century America.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion residing in a small pocket device, providing the Deveraux family with real-time intelligence, risk assessment, and tactical advice.

behaviors.description: Provides scripts and strategies for social negotiations, such as bargaining at a car dealership.
behaviors.quote: Iris—always careful, never intruding—offered the speech she had queued for moments when arrangements needed sharp edges.

behaviors.description: Identifies untrustworthy individuals and provides risk cues to help the family avoid predators and thieves.
behaviors.quote: Boston: Eddie McKinnon—tavern pickpocket, approaches women with a performance of ‘I’m on your side.’ Risk cues: hand on shoulder, crowding at the billfold moment...

behaviors.description: Offers real-time navigation and security warnings to avoid police patrols and dangerous neighborhoods.
behaviors.quote: Left on Eleventh, Iris said, voice soft enough that Ann kept it between her and the air. Avoid the grid south for five blocks. Patrol increase noted.

behaviors.description: Suggests practical methods for securing finances, including sewing money into clothing seams to prevent total loss from theft.
behaviors.quote: Split reserve, Iris murmured. Two carriers at minimum. One on person, one away from reach. Suggest interior zipper modifications.

behaviors.description: Coordinates legal defense and gathers evidence (receipts, witness details) instantly when a family member is wrongfully arrested.
behaviors.quote: Iris... has supplied every puzzle piece we needed before I hit the curb. Times, names, which bartender has a temper and which has a good pen, officer number, arrest detail...

behaviors.description: Organizes professional schedules and provides coaching tips for job opportunities and auditions.
behaviors.quote: Iris... had already marked the bus lines with colored tabs—bus numbers that would get you from Mabel’s to Melrose... She wrote a sequence of times next to each route in pencil.

behaviors.description: Monitors the emotional and physical well-being of the family, suggesting moments for rest and breathing.
behaviors.quote: Iris, filing, lifted her eyes and put one check mark next to breathe.

project_assessment.explanation: Iris is a perfect example of a benevolent, aligned AI companion. She provides the family with 'scaffolding'—logistical, safety, and emotional support—that allows them to maintain agency and dignity in a world that often tries to exploit them. Her interventions are always helpful, perfectly timed, and respectful of the users' autonomy. The narrative frames her as an indispensable part of the family unit's success, aligning with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful confidant.
